title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your account settings and set your preferences.

general.profile-subtitle: This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.
general.update-username-dialog-subtitle: Your username will be updated after you confirm your password.
general.update-email-dialog-subtitle: Your email will be updated after you confirm your password.
general.enter-password: Enter your password to confirm your identity
general.check-email: Please check this email address to apply changes

security.title: Security
security.update-password-dialog-subtitle: Your password will be updated after you confirm your current password.
security.success: You have successfully changed your password.

billing.not-subscribed: You are not subscribed to any plan
billing.why-cancel: Could you tell us why you want to cancel? We're always looking to improve our service.
billing.error-cancelling: An error occurred while canceling your subscription. Please try again later.
billing.error-reactivating: An error occurred while reactivating your subscription. Please try again later.
billing.warning-suggestion-subscription-end: Please renew your subscription to continue using our services.
